name: hiredis
description: Wrapper for reply processing code in hiredis
author: Pieter Noordhuis <pcnoordhuis@gmail.com>

scripts.preinstall: git clone git://github.com/redis/hiredis.git deps/hiredis; cd deps/hiredis; git reset --hard 6bd1172419a385673c9f893d0a75c4220f87a5bb; cd ../..; node-gyp rebuild
